name: CLLocationPushServiceExtension
desc: A protocol that provides the entry point for the Location Push Service Extension.

items.name: func didReceiveLocationPushPayload([String : Any], completion: () -> Void)
items.desc: The system calls this function when the device receives a location push for your app.

items.name: func serviceExtensionWillTerminate()
items.desc: A function the system calls before terminating the service extension.
